about_the_game:
DepowerBall is a competitive party platformer where the more you win, the more you lose. Compete against other players to feed the hungry dragon queen as you score points to win a set number of rounds. As players win rounds, losing players will vote to take away the one of the winner's powers, making it harder for them to win (putting the 'Depower' in 'DepowerBall').

Because players' skills diminish as a match rolls on, you need to adapt and change strategies round by round in order to win. In the end, only one player will survive and win the favour of the Dragon Queen. Will it be you?

The demo will give you a chance to experience the fast paced multiplayer gameplay that will be available in the full version!

Play as one of four characters and compete against other players locally in The Pit!

Play as many times as you want! And please wishlist the full version on Steam so you can be notified when it comes out!

short_description: DepowerBall is a dragon feeding, skill eliminating, revenge seeking party platformer. Be the first to feed the Dragon Queen and score points to win rounds. As you win rounds, the other players will even the odds by taking away your powers, forcing you to adapt your strategy...or get left behind.
